EmailTemplate.name: Autopro Email 2.Autopro 2 EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy and AUTOPRO’s new Partnership
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I wanted to connect with you again to remind you about the communication you received from NAPA head office, notifying you of Grand & Toy and AUTOPRO’s new partnership.
The supply contract has been implemented to assist in controlling operating expenses, while allowing you to order via Grand & Toy’s customized NAPA web platform. The contract includes but is not limited to: Office supplies, Technology items, Maintenance and cleaning supplies - along with a special focus on Ink and Toner through the LEXMARK Toner program. Please feel free to check out these solutions on our website at www.grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp=EBAUTOPRO2EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>.
As your dedicated National Account Manager– I would like to schedule a phone call with you to further introduce the program and assist in getting your new account created.
When you have a few minutes, can you please give me a call at 1-800-348-2184 Ext 44042?
Thank you, I look forward to working with you.
Chris Lacroix National Inside Account Manager
Gestionnaire Interne des Comptes Nationaux
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1G 0Z6 9C7 E-mail: christianlacroix@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:christianlacroix@grandandtoy.com ]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 44042 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
AVIS DE CONFIDENTIALITÉ : Le contenu de ce courriel (et de ses documents joints, s’il y a lieu) est protégé et confidentiel. Il n’est destiné qu’au destinataire ou aux destinataires indiqué(s) ci-dessus. Il est strictement interdit, pour toute autre personne, de le divulguer, le communiquer ou le reproduire. Si vous avez reçu cet envoi par erreur, veuillez le détruire et nous en aviser immédiatement par courriel.
